metadata.title: CVE-2017-12778 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The UI Lock feature in qBittorrent version 3.3.15 isvulnerable to Authentication Bypass, which allows Attack to gainunauthorized access to qBittorrent functions by tampering the affected flagvalue of the config file at the C:\Users\<username>\Roaming\qBittorrentpathname. The attacker must change the value of the "locked" attribute to"false" within the "Locking" stanza. NOTE: This is an intended behavior.Seehttps://github.com/qbittorrent/qBittorrent/wiki/I-forgot-my-UI-lock-password.

criterions.comment: qbittorrent package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
